programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The New Suspect
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A new hunt for the mysterious Zodiac Killer gains unprecedented access to files, unearthing a complicated cypher that may contain the killer's name, and links between the Zodiac Killer and an unsolved case.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The Military Connection
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The hunt uncovers clues that the Zodiac Killer may have served in the U.S. Armed Forces, as the team's supercomputer identifies strange symbols.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - A New Code Uncovered
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 The hunt uncovers a mysterious new cipher related to the Zodiac Killer, while the team's supercomputer uncovers a strange lunar pattern linking the killings. A taunting riddle by the killer may lead to a body. A second prime suspect emerges.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The Secret FBI Files
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 The hunt goes into high-gear as the FBI releases secret files on the mysterious Zodiac Killer.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The Code is Cracked
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 Sal and Ken investigate San Francisco, the epicenter of the Zodiac Killer murders, as the Code Team announces extraordinary news.

programme.title: The First 48 - Taken
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 2 When a young man and his pregnant fiance are executed after a failed ransom attempt, Atlanta Homicide will stop at nothing to identify the elusive suspect.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - The Luchalooters
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 Celebrity little people and twin wrestlers Jorge and Miguel have a larger-than-life appetite for drugs and alcohol. And when they're both found dead after a wild night of partying, an autopsy reveals the culprit is eye drops.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Love Bites
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 43 A popular teenage girl is found brutally stabbed to death in her car in a small Pennsylvania city. She wasn’t sexually assaulted, but as police look closer, they discover she was involved in a shocking love triangle that breaks all the rules.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Nature's Clues
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 How do bugs, pigs, and even the weather help investigators solve crimes? From tropical Hawaii to the frigid waters of Lake Ontario, forensic experts reveal, in gory detail, the clues nature leaves behind on a human corpse.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 1
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The bodycam squad risk their lives to save civilians in a fire, and tackle a thief who's not going down quietly. One officer discovers his inner cowboy.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 On this episode, the squad deals with a man causing mayhem from a rooftop, a suspect that tries to give them the slip, and an unruly nightclubber who won't go peacefully.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Derrick Bird
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 In Cumbria, 2010 taxi driver Derek Bird took his gun and, in less than 24 hours, shot dead 12 people and injured 11 more. The callous killer only stopped when he had run out of ammunition, finally turning the gun on himself.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Danny Rolling
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 In 2010, Derek Bird took his gun and, in less than twenty-four hours, killed twelve people and injured eleven more. He stopped when he had run out of ammunition, finally turning the gun on himself.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - David Heiss
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 Danny Rolling, known as the Gainesville Ripper, murdered five university students in Florida in 1990. Rolling also confessed to murdering a family in his hometown of Shreveport, Louisiana.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - BTK – Dennis Rader
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 Dennis Rader, known to the World as the BTK Killer, killed ten people, including young children, between 1974 and 1991 in Wichita, Kansas.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Serial Rapist of Sacramento
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 316 The story of a sexual predator and his horrific attacks, how he managed to evade the law for years and how determined investigators, forensic technology and a legal loophole finally tracked him down.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Tortured Love
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 317 Tortured Love is the story of a cruel and sadistic crime, a victim who barely survives and how investigators and forensics corroborate her story to bring her merciless attacker to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Highway Horror
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 318 Highway Horror is the tragic story of Shelby Weatherly, the events leading up to her brutal murder and how determined police work eventually caught her killer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Tantra Rapist
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 319 The Tantra Rapist follows the investigation to catch a serial rapist, his erratic and unpredictable lifestyle and how advanced DNA technology finally tracked him down.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Forever Missing
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 In Canyon, TX, teenager Fred Moseley is left home alone over a long weekend – and abruptly disappears. His beloved new car is found abandoned on the outskirts of town... his shotgun missing. Chris Hansen investigates a mystery that lasted ten years.

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Dancing with Syndication in the Pale Moonlight
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 After Gene Roddenberry's death, Trek ventured into yet another incarnation. Deep Space Nine was different from its predecessor, set on a space station. Its 1993 debut featured an African American Captain and heavily serialized story arcs - both firsts.

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Voyage(r) to the Delta Quadrant
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 1995 brought another Trek series. This one featured a new starship, a return to episodic storytelling, and Trek's first female Captain, Kathryn Janeway. It was also the flagship for Paramount's new television network, United Paramount Network (UPN).

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Starships A-Z
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 Kirk, Spock, Picard, Data - the list of great Trek characters is incomplete without the Enterprise, Starfleet's flagship vessel. But Enterprise isn't alone - there's a whole list of Federation vessels that aren't appreciated enough.

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - It's Been A Long Time…
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 Plagued by fledgling UPN's underperformance, Enterprise's premise (a prequel about the Federation's founding) was undercut by the decision to make the third season a reaction to 9/11. Lackluster ratings meant it would only get four seasons.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Ensigns of Command
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 149 After a century of silence, the Enterprise receives a message from the Sheliac system informing them that they have discovered a human colony on a world in their sector.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Evolution
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Survivors
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 151 The Enterprise responds to a distress call from Rana IV, a Federation colony that is under attack from an unknown alien ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Who Watches the Watchers
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 152 A proto-Vulcan culture worships Captain Picard and prepares to offer Counselor Troi as a sacrifice.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Bonding
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 153 A startling surprise awaits the crew of the Enterprise when a mission costs the life of a crew member, who left her son behind.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Booby Trap
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 154 The Enterprise picks up ancient radio signal code from the ruined planet Aurelius 9, remnants of the total war over 1,000 years ago between Mentaurs and Promelians which caused both races' extinction.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Enemy
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 155 LaForge gets left behind on a storm-plagued planet when the rest of his team encounters a Romulan warrior.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Price
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 156 While the Enterprise hosts negotiations for control of a stable wormhole, Troi forms a personal relationship with an opposing negotiator, unaware of his true being.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Vengeance Factor
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 157 The Enterprise pursues a race of "gatherers" who continue to raid Federation outposts, unaware of the dangers lurking among them.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Defector
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 158 When a Romulan officer defects to the Federation with a warning of an impending invasion, Capt. Picard struggles to decide if he is to be believed.

programme.title: The Librarian: The Curse of the Judas Chalice - The Librarian: The Curse of the Judas Chalice
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When a brilliant student takes a job at the New York Public Library, he learns it actually involves safeguarding ancient mystic and historical treasures secretly warehoused there, protecting them from the forces of evil.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 101 - The Future of Law Enforcement
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 RoboCop is back to provide justice in Delta City. While investigating the murders of several homeless people, he uncovers some of the city's darker secrets.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 102 - Prime Suspect
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 Framed for the murder of a popular Televangelist, RoboCop becomes a fugitive from the law as he and Madigan race against time to find the real killer.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 103 - Trouble In Delta City
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 When Madigan gets hooked on a new weight-loss product, RoboCop uncovers an insidious plot by the evil genius Dr. Cray Mallardo to drive the inhabitants of Delta City as crazy as he is.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 104 - What Money Can't Buy
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 RoboCop's rescue of a young boy in need of a lung transplant is thwarted by a ruthless criminal and his gang, who steal the life-saving organ to sell on the black market.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 105 - Officer Missing
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 When OCP institutes cost-cutting nightly power blackouts, a roving gang terrorizes the darkened streets endangering the lives of RoboCop and the Chairman.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 106 - Ghosts of War
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 When a band of mentally unstable war veterans steals a top secret weapon and lays siege to OCP Public Works, RoboCop must race against time to save Diana from destruction.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 107 - Zone Five
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 To combat an epidemic of a narcotic called FUN, OCP recruits a gang of vigilantes to police Old Detroit. However, when Jimmy Murphy enlists, RoboCop uncovers the gang's sinister plot to flood the city with drugs.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 108 - Provision 22
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 When OCP privatizes the welfare system, RoboCop learns that Nancy Murphy is leading a group of jobless people protesting the corporation's methods. Her actions make her a target for a pair of ruthless executives who will stop at nothing to silence her.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 109 - Faces of Eve
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 Villainous psychopath Pudface Morgan and his gang use OCP's latest cosmetic product, EVE, to unleash a crime wave on the city, baffling the police and RoboCop as they alter their physical appearance at will.

programme.title: Robocop - Robocop
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: FailArmy Presents: Very Merry Fail-mas - FailArmy Presents: Very Merry Fail-mas
programme.desc: Season 1, A very special gift of the most hilarious fails wrapped in the FailArmy Christmas special.

programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 These home cooks are the recipe for disaster when coming together for a joyous meal goes up in flames.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Thaw
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 23 Thanks to a complex sensory system controlled by a computer, Kim and others are literally held hostage by fear.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tuvix
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A bizarre occurrence during transport causes Tuvok and Neelix to fuse into one alien humanoid known as "Tuvix."

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Resolutions
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 After contracting a deadly virus, Janeway and Chakotay are forced into exile on a planet that shields them from the effects of the fatal disease.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Basics, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 26 Using Chakotay's son as a pawn, Seska lures Voyager into an explosive showdown with the Kazon.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Basics, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 While the crew fights for survival on a primitive planet, a lone crewmember battles the Kazon who have taken over the Voyager ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Flashback
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 Tuvok experiences a repressed memory that's linked to his first Starfleet assignment under the command of the renowned Captain Sulu.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Chute
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 Convicted of a crime they didn't commit, Paris and Kim may spend the rest of their lives in a hellish prison.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Swarm
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 While the crew battles a swarm of alien ships, Kes struggles to stop the Doctor's memory circuits from deteriorating.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - False Profits
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 The crew tries to free the people of the planet Takar from two Ferengi opportunists posing as gods.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Remember
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 Torres is troubled by a series of dreams in which she seems to be reliving another woman's life.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Sacred Ground
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 To save Kes's life, Janeway must test her own spiritual beliefs by undergoing the secret ritual of an alien religious order.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Future's End, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 The crew visits 20th century Los Angeles to prevent a timeship from destroying the Earth's solar system.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Future's End, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 The crew races against time to stop a 20th century computer industrialist from causing a 29th century disaster.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Warlord
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 Kes's body is taken over by the mind of a ruthless political leader who's determined to regain control of his planet.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 4
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 This episode includes: Bad Chief, Locust Grove, Update: Pizza Man and Perpetual Partners.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 14
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 This episode includes: Death by Drowning, Update: Sweetheart Escape, Grandma's Grave and CIA Secrets.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 23
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 23 This episode includes: Motorcycle Mom & UD, Update: Ready Teller Robbery, White Bird, Strychnine Death and Missing Mariners.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack: Episode: 8 - Episode: 8
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 8 This episode includes: Battling for Her Brother & UD, UD: Johnny Lee Wilson, Kempton's Search & UD, Missing Bonnie & UD and Devil's Backbone.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 17
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 This episode includes: Thanks Captain Sharp, Harold and Ma, Over the Edge & UD and Ogo Pogo.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack: Episode: 10 - Episode: 10
programme.desc: Season 12, Episode 10 This episode includes: Rudolph on the Run & UD, Racial Rift & UD, Child Prodigies and Lifeguard Missing & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 7
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 7 This episode includes: Moss Beach Ghosts, Civil War Ghosts, She Sold Babies & UD, UD: Pierre's Amnesia and Bus Stop Amnesia & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 3
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 3 This episode includes: Arson King, Huey Long (Pts. 1 & 2) & UD and Brother X & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 This episode includes: Badlands & UD, Sixty Miles, McFall and Mail Call & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 2
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 2 This episode includes: Love Triangle & UD, Champ, Pierre's Amnesia & UD, UD: Honky Tonk Woman, Killer Kranz & UD and Memphis Kidnap & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 This episode includes: Missing Medic & UD, Update: Serial Molester, Killer Casanova & UD and Vancouver Lights.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 13 This episode includes: Chad, UD: Thanks Big Brother, Honky Tonk Woman & UD, Practical Joker & UD and Nine Lives & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 20
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 20 This episode includes: Mystery Hum, UD: School Bus Family, Car Crash Thank You & UD, Dial's Escape & UD and Taking a Dive & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 23
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 This episode includes: World Leaders, Marie Hilley, Experts/Walker and Women in the Bay & UD.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 10 A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: MST3K: Robot Wars - MST3K: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch ROBOT WARS (1993). A new SOL is introduced and a new Gizmonic tech arrives.

programme.title: MST3K: Bride Of The Monster - MST3K: Bride Of The Monster
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Santa Claus - Santa Claus
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 27 Mike and the bots watch Santa Claus mess around with a devil while trying to deliver gifts and then sing politically correct holiday songs.

programme.title: MST3K: The Christmas Dragon - MST3K: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 All three hosts watch a group of precocious orphans attempt save a dying Father Christmas in THE CHRISTMAS DRAGON (2014).

programme.title: MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians - MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Martians abduct Santa Claus and two human children in hopes of bringing Christmas to their planet.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera - MST3K: Gamera
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A giant mutated turtle wakes from eons of slumber and attacks Japan in Gamera: The Giant Monster (1965). The Bots create their own beauty salon and are treated to a visit from Gamera himself.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera Vs. Barugon - MST3K: Gamera Vs. Barugon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The Mads send the crew another Gamera movie. This time, a group of travelers scour the jungle in search of a giant opal. What they find is actually the egg of a lizard-dog creature called Barugon.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera Vs. Gaos - MST3K: Gamera Vs. Gaos
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Gamera is back and this time he is up against Gaos, a bat-monster with the ability to shoot laser beams. Joel and the Bots make an arts and crafts project.

programme.title: A Painted House - A Painted House
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper - My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Two sisters embark on a journey of discovery and reconciliation in this poignant real-life story based on the memoirs of Margaret Moorman.

programme.title: Mitch Albom's Have a Little Faith - Mitch Albom's Have a Little Faith
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The story follows the spiritual journeys of three men: a suburban rabbi, an inner-city pastor, and an author. Stars Bradley Whitford, Laurence Fishburne, and Martin Landau. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Decoration Day - Decoration Day
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A grumpy man must rejoin his community when his godchild gets in trouble and a childhood friend refuses to accept a Congressional Medal of Honor for bravery in World War II. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Missing Pieces - Missing Pieces
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Once Upon a Winter's Date - Once Upon a Winter's Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: Love at Sea - Love at Sea
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. Olivia gets a great opportunity to organize an event on a luxury cruise.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Rising (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A new Stargate team, led by Dr. Elizabeth Weir (Torri Higginson) embarks on a dangerous mission to a distant galaxy, where they discover the mythical lost city of Atlantis -- and a deadly new enemy that feeds on human fear. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Rising (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A new Stargate team, led by Dr. Elizabeth Weir (Torri Higginson) embarks on a dangerous mission to a distant galaxy, where they discover the mythical lost city of Atlantis -- and a deadly new enemy. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Hide And Seek
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 McKay (David Hewlett) volunteers to be the first to try Beckett's (Paul McGillion) newest ATA gene therapy. But things go wrong when the device cannot be removed, and is stopping Dr. McKay from being able to eat or drink and endangering his life.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Thirty Eight Minutes
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 The Stargate team must rush to save Major John Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) after he becomes lodged in the Stargate, with only 38 minutes until the gate automatically disengages, and Sheppard is expelled into space, where he will surely asphyxiate.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Faith
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 Dwindling supplies, tedious routines, and low morale continue to plague the crew of the Destiny when the ship suddenly drops out of FTL and enters the orbit of an uncharted star. But, for the first time, the countdown clock doesn’t activate!

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Human
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 Disregarding orders, Dr. Rush links himself to the Destiny’s computer via the neural interface chair, hoping it will reveal the code needed to control Destiny’s flight path. Learning of this, Col. Young struggles with letting Rush risk his life.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Lost
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Trapped beneath ruins in an underground maze, some of the Destiny's crew are stranded when the ship jumps back into FTL. The situation grows even more desperate when Rush (Robert Carlyle) learns that Destiny will soon be leaving the galaxy!

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Sabotage
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 16 With crew members stranded, Destiny continues to cross from the present galaxy into the next one. Unable to alter the Destiny's course, Dr. Rush calculates the Destiny will fall short of making it to the next galaxy, stranding them indefinitely.

programme.title: Stargate: The Ark of Truth - Stargate: The Ark of Truth
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When the SG-1 crew discovers that a final assault on Earth is in the works and a double-agent is scheming among them, their mission takes on a new meaning as they travel to the Ori's home galaxy to overtake their arch enemy before it's too late.

programme.title: Stargate: Continuum - Stargate: Continuum
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In this adrenaline-driven, action-adventure, members of SG-1 find themselves returning to a world where their history has been dramatically altered and the Stargate program never existed! Richard Dean Anderson, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks star.

programme.title: Stargate Origins: Catherine - Stargate Origins: Catherine
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 'Stargate Origins' follows Catherine Langford, whose father, archeologist Paul Langford, discovered the eponymous Stargate in 1928, when Catherine was a young girl. Young Catherine explores the mysteries of the Stargate in an attempt to save Earth.
